title.value: “Your child needs surgery”: A survey-based evaluation of simulated expert consent conversations by key stakeholders
title.justification: This is the title of the paper as mentioned at the beginning of the document.
title.quote: “Your child needs surgery”: A survey-based evaluation of simulated expert consent conversations by key stakeholders

extractions.description: The study explores expert consenting practice in pediatric surgery from the perspective of key stakeholders. It involves examining recorded consent conversations across various scenarios and evaluating feedback from different participants.

type.justification: The paper involves empirical research through surveys to evaluate consent conversations in pediatric surgery.
type.quote: The aim of this study is to explore expert consenting practice from the key stakeholders' perspective.

name.justification: The paper focuses on informed consent in pediatric surgery, indicating its primary field of research.
name.quote: Background: Consent conversations in pediatric surgery are essential components of pre-operative care...

name.justification: The paper addresses the ethics of informed consent in medical practice, specifically in pediatric surgery.
name.quote: Informed consent is a critical component of medical and surgical care.
